main.java.questfortheabodeth

Class FileOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.questfortheabodeth.FileOperator

  • public class FileOperator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that provides methods for reading and writing CSV files to save and load game data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileOperator(java.lang.String path)
      Creates a new FileOperator on the given file
